952690.name: Infinity Demo
952690.description:
Infinity features three gamemodes to play at your own pace! Standard Play is the main experience. In this gamemode, players will progress through increasingly difficult levels. Each level adds on to the previous by introducing new concepts! There are twelve levels in this gamemode. In Assisted Play, players will progress through increasingly difficult levels. Each level adds on to the previous by introducing new concepts! There are twelve levels in this gamemode, and checkpoints are added in every four levels. We also feature Event Mode. you can learn more about this gamemode down below! The gimmick of Infinity is that there are no checkpoints. (Except for Assisted Play) This makes the game very difficult.

Event Mode is a way for players to play exclusive levels every weekend! These levels are much more complex and can only be played for limited time!

Infinity is a basic platformer, however it's quite challenging and fun! You can expect little to no bugs, great performance and pleasing UI. We plan on supporting Infinity for the remainder of 2018. This means you will be getting free content updates every week!
THE DEMO ONLY CONTAINS STANDARD PLAY
